title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7930.4 - Application process
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7930.4 - Application process

State Regulations

An individual seeking to become an RAS shall submit an
application form to SEO. Such application shall contain statements concerning
the applicant's education, experience, training, the results of the EPA RCP
Program Exam and status of the applicant's RCP listing, and any other
information deemed necessary by SEO. SEO shall notify all applicants whether
they meet the criteria for inclusion on the RAS list. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7930.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
